00018 #include <votca/tools/random.h>
00019 #include <stdexcept>
00020 #include <string>

00022 namespace votca { namespace tools {

00024 using namespace std;
00025 
00026 double  *Random::MARSarray, Random::MARSc, Random::MARScd, Random::MARScm ;
00027 int     Random::MARSi, Random::MARSj ;
00028 
00029 void Random::init( int nA1, int nA2, int nA3, int nB1 )
00030 {
00031   /*
00032      initializes the global data of the
00033      MARSAGLIA pseudo random number generator
00034   */
00035 
00036   int mA1, mA2, mA3, mANEW, mB1, mHELP ;
00037   int i1, i2 ;
00038   double varS, varT ;
00039 
00040   MARSarray = (double*)malloc(MARS_FIELD_SIZE*sizeof(double)); 
00041 
00042   mA1 = nA1 ; mA2 = nA2 ; mA3 = nA3 ;
00043   mB1 = nB1 ;
00044   MARSi  = 97 ; MARSj  = 33 ;
00045 
00046   for( i1 = 1 ; i1 < 98 ; i1++ )
00047   {
00048     varS = 0.0 ;
00049     varT = 0.5 ;
00050     for( i2 = 1 ; i2 < 25 ; i2++ )
00051     {
00052       mANEW = ((( mA1 * mA2 ) % 179 )*mA3 ) % 179 ;
00053       mA1 = mA2 ;
00054       mA2 = mA3 ;
00055       mA3 = mANEW ;
00056       mB1 = ( 53*mB1 + 1 ) % 169 ;
00057       mHELP = ( mB1 * mANEW ) % 64 ;
00058       if( mHELP > 31 )
00059         varS += varT ;
00060       varT *= 0.5 ;
00061     }
00062 
00063     MARSarray[ i1 ] = varS ;
00064   }
00065 
00066   MARSc  =   362436.0 / 16777216.0 ;
00067   MARScd =  7654321.0 / 16777216.0 ;
00068   MARScm = 16777213.0 / 16777216.0 ;
00069 
00070   
00071 
00072   return;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void Random::save( char *fileName )
00076 {
00077         FILE *ranFP;
00078         int c[2];
00079         double w[3];
00080         size_t t;
00081 
00082         ranFP = fopen(fileName, "wb");
00083         if (ranFP==NULL)
00084         {
00085                 throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + fileName);
00086         }
00087   
00088         c[0] = MARSi; c[1] = MARSj;
00089         t=fwrite(c, sizeof(int), 2, ranFP);
00090         w[0] = MARSc; w[1] = MARScd; w[2] = MARScm;
00091         t=fwrite(w, sizeof(double), 3, ranFP);
00092         t=fwrite(MARSarray, sizeof(double), MARS_FIELD_SIZE, ranFP);
00093         fclose(ranFP);
00094 }
00095 
00096 void Random::restore( char *fileName )
00097 {
00098         FILE *ranFP;
00099         double w[3];
00100         int c[2];
00101         size_t t;
00102 
00103         ranFP = fopen(fileName, "rb");
00104         if (ranFP==NULL)
00105         {
00106                 throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + fileName);
00107         }
00108   
00109         t=fread(c, sizeof(int), 2, ranFP);
00110         MARSi = c[0]; MARSj = c[1];
00111         t=fread(w, sizeof(double), 3, ranFP);
00112         MARSc = w[0]; MARScd = w[1]; MARScm = w[2];
00113         t=fread(MARSarray, sizeof(double), MARS_FIELD_SIZE, ranFP);
00114         fclose(ranFP);
00115 }
00116 
00117 double Random::rand_uniform( void )
00118 {
00119   /*
00120      generates a pseudo random number 0 .. +1
00121      following the proposal of MARSAGLIA
00122   */
00123 
00124   double ranMARS ;
00125 
00126   ranMARS = MARSarray[ MARSi ] - MARSarray[ MARSj ] ;
00127   if( ranMARS < 0.0 )
00128     ranMARS += 1.0 ;
00129 
00130   MARSarray[ MARSi ] = ranMARS ;
00131 
00132   MARSi-- ;
00133   if( MARSi < 1 )
00134     MARSi = 97 ;
00135 
00136   MARSj-- ;
00137   if( MARSj < 1 )
00138     MARSj = 97 ;
00139 
00140   MARSc -= MARScd ;
00141   if( MARSc < 0.0 )
00142     MARSc += MARScm ;
00143 
00144   ranMARS -= MARSc ;
00145   if( ranMARS < 0.0 )
00146     ranMARS += 1.0 ;
00147 
00148   return ranMARS ;
00149 }
00150 
00153 int Random::rand_uniform_int( int max_int ) 
00154 {
00155   return floor (max_int * rand_uniform() );
00156 }
00157 
00160 double Random::rand_gaussian( double sigma )
00161 {
00162     double r = sigma * sqrt( -2.0*log ( 1 - Random::rand_uniform()) );
00163     double theta = 2.0 * _pi * Random::rand_uniform() ;
00164     return r * cos(theta); // second independent number is r*sin(theta)
00165 }
